body.name: TuoxinEM Over The Toilet Storage Cabinet for Small Spaces for Skinny And Slim Bathroom Storage Corner Floor, Toilet Paper Storage Cabinet with 2 Doors & Shelves (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 58 mins
features: 【Ideal Toilet Paper Dispenser】This bathroom toilet paper storage cabinet with two door and shelves modern design, provides much storage space in your tiny room. This toilet paper storage cabinet can use for 4-5 rolls toilet paper (normal size) one-time storage. A sleek bathroom organizer as a toilet paper dispenser. (Can not fit oversized rolls of Charmin toilet paper)

【Perfect Slim Design for Small Spaces】Our small bathroom storage fits anywhere of your house, small size 6"W x 6.4"D x 30"H can fit any tight spaces, it’s the perfect size to exploit the tight space a small bathroom features. This sleek slim & space-saving design storage cabinet can not only use as a bathroom storage cabinet, also suitable for bedroom and living room organizer.

【USEPA Recognized Cabinet】This small bathroom cabinet made from environmentally-friendly PVC, non-spray paint, waterproof, flame-retardant, lightweight, easy to clean, pass rigorous testing by USEPA, making it safe and convenience for family use.

【Multifunction Bathroom Storage】The top shelf of this bathroom storage cabinet is great for holding corner plant stand or a cell phone, the open shelf design is convenience for toilet paper replace, bottom shelf can also store bathroom accessories inside,the over the toilet storage feature make it super useful in your bathroom.

【Easy Assemble】This thin bathroom storage cabinet, package includes an assembly instruction to guide you quick assemble within 10 minutes. We provides Risk-Free purchase, two-year return/exchange service to your new purchase for our bathroom storage cabinet, any product issues, please feel free to contact us, we help you to solved within 24 hours. Your satisfaction is ours.
body.description: TuoxinEM is a home furniture manufacturer, our team principally involved in design,manufacture and sale. Our furniture products are designed following the philosophy of "Beautifully simple look & Practically serve well".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Putting it together was like playing with legos. So easy and fun. Its not a strong wood-like material but it does the job, and looks very nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I have a very small oddly shaped bathroom and needed something very thin to fit between the sink and toilet. I wanted something with a little bit of counter space on the top for a few makeup items and my contact solutions. This fit perfectly. It is not the highest quality but I wasn’t expecting it to be. The material it is made from is very unique and has actually proven to be very easy to clean in the bathroom with lots of moisture. The directions for assembling were not as confusing as previous posts have suggested just lay out all the pieces in front of you and take it step by step. Only took me about 8 minutes. Also instead of using the top part for toilet paper I utilize it for a small square box of tissues turned on its side and it is perfect. Have actually come to really love this piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Just cheap
reviews.reviewText: Works great! For the price of pretty much $30, you can’t complain. It does have a cheap feel, kind of similar to styrofoam but more sturdy? If that makes sense?It works great though and look really nice, it’s great for small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cheap and small and lightweight. Easy to assemble, but disappointing. Very little storage space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and fits in small spaces.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, you honestly get what you pay for. It's super easy to assemble and holds about 5 rolls of toilet paper, keeping them neatly hidden. I would recommend getting a roll holder for the top compartment to make the process smoother. The only downside, I was hoping the lower compartment would be large enough to hold the toilet brush, but that was my fault for not measuring before making the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For a budget friendly shelf, I like it!
reviews.reviewText: This item would not be worth it over a 15 buck price tag. The materials are ok, it’s mostly a foam type material and the cabinet is very small. But, if you have a tiny space, and need space for meds, random little items, this shelf is great. Perfect for a small rental. Not sure why reviews were saying it was hard to put together? This shelf could be assembled by a toddler. It’s essentially puzzle pieces with some screws to fasten it together. I will update my review to see how it holds up to humidity, but I might take it apart and clear coat it so it holds up to water better. Little concerned that it would warp in a humid environment. Other wise, I was able to store all meds of ours and I ordered a second one to sit next to our sink. Our bathroom has little to no storage, and I used to have a bin on the floor to keep our meds in, this is much much better and it was friendly to the wallet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this cabinet. It's definitely VERY small but it's perfect for what I needed to fit in it. I have no storage besides underneath my sink which has been a pain, but now, feminine hygiene products and baby wipes are conveniently right next to the toilet and I can hide my cat's litter box scoop in the bottom cabinet. It goes together like a puzzle during assembly so it's easy to put together. The finished product is sturdy enough. I wouldn't recommend this for storing anything remotely heavy since it's super lightweight (which is nice imo because it moves easily when I need to clean the bathroom).I will say it looks kinda cheap because the matte finish on the material is kinda odd and they give you shiny silver screws. The color is more dark grey than black. After assembling it, I took some spray paint I had laying around and painted it in under 5 minutes, then added some different knobs I already had. Now it looks 5x more expensive and I love it.If you want something super solid to hold a lot/heavy stuff, I don't recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Photo is misleading
reviews.reviewText: The shelf is cute. However, it came in many prices and fit together like a puzzle then “reinforced with pin screws. It’s more of a styrofoam and wood shaving compressed product. Box it arrived in was only 4” thick and 12” tall. The bottom shelf holds a comet container and 2 lysol toilet gel bottles, it’s very tight fit. The middle shelf fits 1 roll of Costco size toilet paper, if you squeeze it in. The toilet paper section does fit a roll but would work better with a roller in it so the rolls does stick when pulling tissue out.It is cute, but honestly wasn’t worth the price.
El material es bueno se ve durable super fácil de armar trae su herramienta, al ancho es para que entre un rollo de papel de baño regular, llevo rapidísimo muy contenta con la compra

This was so easy to put together. It was very well designed and sturdy. Everything was in the package to assemble even the little Philips screwdriver. Instructions were easy to follow. Fits great for small spaces. Highly recommend

The package was extremely well packed by both the manufacturer and Amazon. I ultimately did not keep it as it was not going to serve my purpose as well as I had thought but there was nothing wrong with the cabinet itself. It was well made and quite sturdy.
Me gusto porque cupo Justo de acuerdo a las medidas señaladas en página y me ha sido de mucha utilidad

It's like thick styrofoam, if you look at it funny it dents. Multiple pieces arrived dented/scratched. The toilet paper doesn't come out smoothly since there's no rod. It's super light weight as well, so trying to do anything with it just knocks it over. You can put like 1 thing in each cabinet, and because of the doors, you can't fit toilet paper rolls in the middle/lower cabinets. 😂
